an10.75:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme*.
an10.75:4.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena migasālāya upāsikāya nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an10.75:4.4: Atha kho migasālā upāsikā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami;
an10.75:4.5: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
an10.75:4.6: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho migasālā upāsikā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca:
an10.75:5.1: “Kathaṃ kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyaṃ.
an10.75:5.2: Pitā me, bhante, purāṇo brahmacārī hoti ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an10.75:5.5: Pitāmaho me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacārī ahosi sadārasantuṭṭho.
an10.75:6.1: Kathaṃ kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyan”ti?
an10.75:7.1: Atha kho āyasmā ānando migasālāya upāsikāya nivesane piṇḍapātaṃ gahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkāmi.
an10.75:7.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an10.75:7.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an10.75:8.1: “Idhāhaṃ, bhante, pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena migasālāya upāsikāya nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an10.75:8.3: Atha kho, bhante, migasālā upāsikā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
an10.75:8.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho, bhante, migasālā upāsikā maṃ etadavoca:
an10.75:9.1: ‘Kathaṃ kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyaṃ.
an10.75:9.2: Pitā me, bhante, purāṇo brahmacārī ahosi ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
an10.75:9.3: So kālaṅkato bhagavatā byākato sakadāgāmī satto tusitaṃ kāyaṃ upapannoti.
an10.75:9.4: Pitāmaho me, bhante, isidatto abrahmacārī ahosi sadārasantuṭṭho.
an10.75:10.1: Kathaṃ kathaṃ nāmāyaṃ, bhante ānanda, bhagavatā dhammo desito aññeyyo, yatra hi nāma brahmacārī ca abrahmacārī ca ubho samasamagatikā bhavissanti abhisamparāyan’ti?
an10.75:10.2: Evaṃ vutte, ahaṃ, bhante, migasālaṃ upāsikaṃ etadavocaṃ:
an10.75:11.1: “Kā cānanda, migasālā upāsikā bālā abyattā ammakā ammakapaññā, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariye ñāṇe?
an10.75:12.1: Dasayime, ānanda, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an10.75:12.4: Tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, yatthassa taṃ dussilyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati.
an10.75:12.5: Tassa savanenapi akataṃ hoti, bāhusaccenapi akataṃ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi appaṭividdhaṃ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ na labhati.
an10.75:12.6: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā hānāya pareti, no visesāya;
an10.75:13.1: Idha panānanda, ekacco puggalo dussīlo hoti.
an10.75:13.2: Tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti yatthassa taṃ dussilyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati.
an10.75:13.3: Tassa savanenapi kataṃ hoti, bāhusaccenapi kataṃ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi paṭividdhaṃ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ labhati.
an10.75:13.4: So kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā visesāya pareti, no hānāya;
an10.75:14.3: Kasmā nesaṃ eko hīno eko paṇīto’ti?
an10.75:14.4: Tañhi tesaṃ, ānanda, hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
an10.75:15.2: Tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti yatthassa taṃ dussilyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati.
an10.75:15.3: Tassa savanenapi kataṃ hoti, bāhusaccenapi kataṃ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi paṭividdhaṃ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ labhati.
an10.75:15.4: Ayaṃ, ānanda, puggalo amunā purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an10.75:15.8: Tasmātihānanda, mā puggalesu pamāṇikā ahuvattha, mā puggalesu pamāṇaṃ gaṇhittha.
an10.75:15.10: Ahaṃ vā, ānanda, puggalesu pamāṇaṃ gaṇheyyaṃ yo vā panassa mādiso.
an10.75:16.1: Idha panānanda, ekacco puggalo sīlavā hoti.

an10.75:26.3: Tassa savanenapi kataṃ hoti, bāhusaccenapi kataṃ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi paṭividdhaṃ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ labhati.

an10.75:28.1: Tatrānanda, yvāyaṃ puggalo uddhato hoti tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti yatthassa taṃ uddhaccaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhati, tassa savanenapi kataṃ hoti, bāhusaccenapi kataṃ hoti, diṭṭhiyāpi paṭividdhaṃ hoti, sāmāyikampi vimuttiṃ labhati.
an10.75:28.2: Ayaṃ, ānanda, puggalo amunā purimena puggalena abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro ca.
an10.75:28.9: Ahaṃ vā, ānanda, puggalesu pamāṇaṃ gaṇheyyaṃ yo vā panassa mādiso.
an10.75:29.1: Kā cānanda, migasālā upāsikā bālā abyattā ammakā ammakapaññā, ke ca purisapuggalaparopariye ñāṇe.
an10.75:29.2: Ime kho, ānanda, dasa puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an10.75:30.1: Yathārūpena, ānanda, sīlena purāṇo samannāgato ahosi tathārūpena sīlena isidatto samannāgato abhavissa, nayidha purāṇo isidattassa gatimpi aññassa.
an10.75:30.2: Yathārūpāya cānanda, paññāya isidatto samannāgato ahosi tathārūpāya paññāya purāṇo samannāgato abhavissa, nayidha isidatto purāṇassa gatimpi aññassa.
an10.75:30.3: Iti kho, ānanda, ime puggalā ubho ekaṅgahīnā”ti.
